title: DevOps Frontend Developer
description:
Functieomschrijving
-------------------


  
Het Nationaal Cyber Security Centrum (NCSC) heeft een missie: de Nederlandse samenleving weerbaar maken tegen digitale dreigingen. Door het snelgroeiende en veranderende cybersecurity domein en technologische mogelijkheden zet het NCSC flink in op een transitie naar een steeds innovatieve hybride gedreven dienstverlening. Wil jij je inzetten voor de digitale veiligheid van Nederland en werken in een dynamische, innovatieve omgeving en met de nieuwste technologie? Lees dan snel verder!



Wat ga je als DevOps Frontend Developer doen?



Je komt te werken bij een van de Agile Scrum ontwikkelteams van Service Ontwikkeling en Beheer (SOB) binnen de unit Informatievoorziening & Techniek (IV&T). In een Agile Scrum team draag je T-shaped bij aan de ontwikkeling en het beheer van maatwerk NCSC diensten.



Jouw werkzaamheden:


* Development (React); Op basis van UX/UI designs, of eigen gesprekken met de business/collega engineers maken van gebruiksvriendelijke kwalitatieve Frontend;
* Development (React); Borgen dat diensten functioneel blijven aansluiten bij de wensen van de business;
* Ops; Borgen dat de digitale diensten blijvend voldoen aan de hoogste eisen op gebied van security (BBN3), beschikbaarheid en performance;
* Een Piketdienst wordt naar verwachting onderdeel van de functie.


De werksfeer is informeel en er wordt veel ruimte voor eigen initiatief geboden. In tweewekelijkse sprints dragen we als team bij aan de missie van NCSC. Iedereen is elke dag welkom, maar als team zijn we 1 dag per week op kantoor.


  
Functie-eisen
-------------


  
Wie ben jij?  

Een kleine check: Je hebt zin om hard te werken, fouten te maken en veel te leren. Je hebt veel ervaring met React en bij voorkeur ook ervaring met een andere programmeertaal. Uiteraard ben je ook bekend met het programmeren tegen API’s. Je hebt kennis en ervaring opgedaan met GIT en bent bekend met Kubernetes maar vooral geïnteresseerd in Cloud technologie.



Verder beschik je over:


* Ervaring met het werken in Agile SCRUM DevOps-teams
* Ervaring met Security aspecten / informatiebeveiliging
* Minimaal drie jaar werkervaring als Frontend Engineer React
* Ervaring met het schrijven van testen
* Hbo- werk- en denkniveau met bij voorkeur een afgeronde Bachelor in een relevante richting

  
Arbeidsvoorwaarden
------------------


  
* Salarisniveau schaal 11
* Maandsalaris Min €4.024 – Max. €6.110 (bruto)
* Dienstverband Arbeidsovereenkomst voor bepaalde tijd met uitzicht op onbepaalde tijd
* Contractduur 1 jaar
* Minimaal aantal uren per week 32
* Maximaal aantal uren per week 36

  
Overige arbeidsvoorwaarden
--------------------------


  
Naast het salaris ontvang je een Individueel Keuzebudget (IKB). Het IKB bestaat uit geld (16,50% van je bruto jaarsalaris) en tijd. Met het IKB maak jij de keuzes die bij jou passen en kun je een deel van je arbeidsvoorwaarden zelf samenstellen. Je kunt er bijvoorbeeld voor kiezen om een deel van je maandinkomen te laten uitbetalen wanneer jij dat wenst. Ook kun je dit budget omzetten in verlof en andersom of besteden aan fiscaal vriendelijke doelen. De Rijksoverheid hecht sterk aan persoonlijke groei en loopbaanontwikkeling en biedt daarvoor tal van mogelijkheden. Tot de secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden behoren onder meer verschillende studiefaciliteiten, bedrijfsfitness, volledige vergoeding van je OV-reiskosten woon-werkverkeer en gedeeltelijk betaald ouderschapsverlof.


  
Bijzonderheden
--------------


  
Het Nationaal Cyber Security Centrum (NCSC) is een groeiende organisatie in transitie met uiteenlopende vraagstukken waarbij flexibiliteit gewenst is om ook in de toekomst wendbaar te blijven tegen cyberdreigingen. Interesse? Graag ontvangen wij jouw cv en motivatie als word- of pdf-bestand via onderstaande sollicitatie button. Als we goede sollicitaties binnenkrijgen kan het zijn dat we de sluitingstermijn niet afwachten. Heb je interesse, reageer dan snel!



Wat mag je van ons verwachten? Wanneer we een match zien nemen we contact met je op om een eerste sollicitatiegesprek in te plannen. De sollicitatieprocedure bestaat uit twee sollicitatiegesprekken gevolgd door een arbeidsvoorwaardengesprek. Een casus, opdracht, assessment en/of vaardigheidstest kan deel uitmaken van het sollicitatieproces, net als het opvragen van referenties en het inzetten van een (online) screening.



Het toetsen van de integriteit van onze nieuwe collega’s is voor het Nationaal Cyber Security Centrum van groot belang. Om die reden maakt een veiligheidsonderzoek op niveau A of B deel uit van het sollicitatieproces. Dit onderzoek wordt uitgevoerd door de Algemene Inlichtingen- en Veiligheidsdienst en neemt doorgaans acht weken in beslag. Meer informatie over het onderzoek vind je op https://www.aivd.nl/onderwerpen/veiligheidsonderzoek. Jouw werklocatie zal thuis en op kantoor zijn. Meer informatie hierover kun je terugvinden op CAO Rijk.


  
**Meer over de functiegroep Medewerker Behandelen en Ontwikkelen**
------------------------------------------------------------------


Door het Functiegebouw Rijk worden medewerkers en leidinggevenden geholpen bij het maken van resultaat- en ontwikkelafspraken in functioneringsgesprekken en krijgt men inzicht in de loopbaanmogelijkheden binnen de Rijksoverheid.


Meer informatie op Functiegebouw Rijksoverheid


**Meer over jouw toekomstige afdeling**
---------------------------------------



Unit Informatievoorziening & Techniek (IV&T)  

Binnen de Unit Informatievoorziening & Techniek (IV&T) zijn er de clusters Data & Analytics en Service Ontwikkeling en Beheer (SOB). Hier werken 10 multidisciplinaire Agile Scrum teams op een state off the art ontwikkelomgeving (Kubernetes ArgoCD GitLab Python React) onder het motto:



“Bouw bruggen, geen muren, altijd in beweging”



Onze kernprincipes zijn:



* Samenwerking: Wij geloven in de kracht van het samenbrengen in één Agile team (Multidisciplinair) van ontwikkeling (Dev) en operations (Ops).


* Automatisering: Wij streven naar automatisering van repetitieve taken.


* Continue Levering: Wij omarmen het concept van continue levering (CI/CD).


* Cloud-technologie: Wij zien Cloud-technologie als het cruciale hulpmiddel voor softwareontwikkeling, -implementatie en -ops.


* Infra a Code (IaC): Daar waar mogelijk hanteren wij IaC hierdoor kunnen we snel en consistent infrastructuur implementeren, wijzigen en repliceren.


* Microservices: Vinden wij essentieel omdat het de schaalbaarheid, flexibiliteit en onderhoudbaarheid van softwaretoepassingen verbetert.


* Shift left: Wij integreren security- en testaspecten vroegtijdig in de levenscyclus van softwareontwikkeling om de beveiliging en kwaliteit te waarborgen, Shift left.


* Feedback en Leren: Wij hechten waarde aan continue feedback en leren.


* Gedeelde Verantwoordelijkheid: Elke teamlid, van ontwikkelaars tot operators, deelt de verantwoordelijkheid voor het leveren van waarde en het handhaven van systeembetrouwbaarheid.


* Rijksstandaarden en Wetgeving : Wij hechten het hoogste belang aan het naleven van Rijksstandaarden en Wetgeving.


**Nationaal Cyber Security Centrum**
------------------------------------



Het NCSC werkt aan een digitaal veilig Nederland. Door het tempo waarin het cybersecuritydomein zich ontwikkelt en de rol van het NCSC daarin, ligt er een flinke uitdaging voor de toekomst. Het is voor ons als hét kennisinstituut van cybersecurity in Nederland essentieel dat wij Nederland van kwalitatief hoogwaardige en actuele informatie voorzien, in crisistijd en daarbuiten. Deze kennis en kunde halen wij mede uit en delen wij ook weer met ons netwerk (overheden, bedrijfsleven en andere nationale en internationale partners). Op deze wijze proberen we tijdig in te springen op nieuw ontdekte kwetsbaarheden, aanvalscampagnes en ernstige ICT-verstoringen om deze te voorkomen en op te lossen. Als het toch misgaat beperken we op deze manier de impact.



**Stel gerust je vraag**
------------------------


### **Meer informatie over deze vacature**

Erik Hagen 06-27510738
### **Meer informatie over de sollicitatieprocedure**

Team Recruitment

title: Senior Consultant Data Engineering
description:
**Wat breng je mee?**
---------------------

* HBO/WO werk- en denkniveau, bij voorkeur in een relevante studierichting zoals Data Science, Econometrie of IT
* Minimaal 3-5 jaar werkervaring met data-analyse en -engineering
* Ervaring met het Power Platform (waaronder PowerBI), SQL, Python en Javascript
* Kennis van Azure en ervaring met het ontwikkelen van cloud-gebaseerde oplossingen
* Ervaring met het ontwerpen en implementeren van ETL-processen
* Bekendheid met zowel relationele als niet-relationele data structuren
* Sterke analytische en statistische vaardigheden
* Kennis van financiële analyse, financiën en accounting is een pré
* Uitstekende communicatieve vaardigheden in zowel Nederlands als Engels
* Proactieve en oplossingsgerichte houding, met het vermogen om zelfstandig en in teamverband te werken


**Wat bieden wij?**
-------------------

* Een contract voor onbepaalde tijd met uitstekende primaire voorwaarden
* Een 32- tot 40-urige werkweek
* 28 vakantiedagen en een diversiteitsdag
* Focus op een gezonde work-life balance
* Interne vakinhoudelijke en persoonlijke vaardigheidstrainingen
* Een goede werksfeer in een betrokken, hecht en divers team
* Een persoonlijke mentor die jou intensief begeleidt en coacht
* Mogelijkheid tot hybride werken
* Een telefoon en laptop, en een aangepaste thuiswerkplek
* Een goede mobiliteitsregeling, inclusief de mogelijkheid tot een leasefiets of leaseauto


**Wat ga je doen?**
-------------------


Als Senior Consultant Data Engineer ben je als specialist verantwoordelijk voor het ondersteunen van onze klanten bij hun digitale transformatie, met focus op Audit en Finance gerelateerde (technische) data vraagstukken. Je werkt nauw samen met een team van specialisten met verschillende achtergronden. Je helpt klanten om hun bedrijfsvoering te optimaliseren door middel van geavanceerde data-analyse, automatisering en innovatieve digitale oplossingen. Je bent gedreven om de technische data aspecten te analyseren en oplossingen te ontwikkelen. Ook binnen Forvis Mazars Nederland zul je ingezet worden op projecten om onze dienstverlening verder te optimaliseren met toepassing van data analyse en de nieuwste technieken en technologie.  



**Verantwoordelijkheden**


* Uitvoeren van data-analyse en -modellering met Python voor zowel analytics als development doeleinden
* Ontwikkelen van webapplicaties en automatiseringsoplossingen met behulp van Javascript (React, Vue) en REST API’s (PowerBI, SharePoint)
* Beheren en optimaliseren van databases met SQL
* Ontwerpen en implementeren van ETL-processen voor data-integratie
* Werken met zowel relationele als niet-relationele data structuren (SQL, XML, JSON, etc.)
* Ontwikkelen en implementeren van dashboards en rapportages in PowerBI
* Begeleiden junior teamleden op het gebied van data analyse / data engineering
* Geven van trainingen en workshops aan klanten en interne teamleden


**Het team**
------------


Ons team bestaat uit een groep enthousiaste specialisten op het gebied van finance, control en accounting én data-analyse en digitalisering dat graag verder wil groeien en volop in ontwikkeling is.  

Met elkaar hebben we een goede combinatie van ervaringsniveaus, achtergrond en expertise. Door de diverse samenstelling in ons team kunnen we als professionals groeien en van elkaar leren. We leveren als team hoogwaardige diensten en producten aan onze klanten, zowel intern als extern op het gebied van data-analyse en digitalisering. Met elkaar bedienen we verschillende cliënten, van verschillende omvang en uit diverse sectoren. De opdrachten zijn gevarieerd, maar digitale transformatie in de finance omgeving staat altijd centraal. Afhankelijk van je interesses en achtergrond kan je rol een meer intern (team-ondersteuning) dan wel extern (client-facing) karakter hebben.


**Waarin maken wij het verschil?**
----------------------------------


Bij Forvis Mazars geloven wij in de vrijheid om je werk zelf in te richten, de mogelijkheid om jezelf constant te blijven ontwikkelen en persoonlijke aandacht in een team waarin je elkaar kent en je mag meedenken over de organisatie. Je krijgt een persoonlijke mentor die jou begeleidt en coacht en je komt terecht in een betrokken en hecht team waar een goede werksfeer heerst.


Binnen onze organisatie vinden wij het belangrijk om onze maatschappelijke rol samen met onze collega's serieus te nemen. Daarom krijgt iedereen bij Forvis Mazars in Nederland de mogelijkheid om jaarlijks 20 uur maatschappelijk (vrijwilligers)werk te doen via de Forvis Mazars Foundation.


**Over Forvis Mazars in Nederland**
-----------------------------------


Forvis Mazars is een toonaangevend wereldwijd netwerk in de financiële dienstverlening dat onder één merknaam opereert met twee leden: Forvis Mazars, LLP in de Verenigde Staten en Forvis Mazars Group SC, een internationale geïntegreerde partnership die actief is in meer dan 100 landen. Met diepgaande kennis van regels en gedegen inzicht in de markt ondersteunen wij bij Forvis Mazars in Nederland onze klanten en dragen wij bij aan de maatschappij. Dit kunnen wij niet zonder onze medewerkers: zij spelen een centrale rol in het realiseren van onze groeidoelstellingen. Wij stimuleren onze collega’s dan ook om zich in elke fase van hun carrière te blijven ontwikkelen. Wij zetten mensen boven processen en je kunt bij ons écht impact maken. Collega’s ervaren Forvis Mazars als een mensgerichte organisatie met een toegankelijke managementstijl, een goede balans en een open feedback- en coachingcultuur. Kiezen voor Forvis Mazars betekent dat je aan het roer staat van je carrière en dat je van het begin tot het eind zelf je koers bepaalt.


**Sollicitatieproces**
----------------------

* Telefonische kennismaking
* Gesprek met manager of director
* Online assessment
* Gesprek met partner
* Aanbod
* Welkom bij Forvis Mazars!


**Interesse?**
--------------


Herken jij jezelf in het bovenstaande profiel en ben je enthousiast geworden over deze functie? Dan komen we graag met je in contact. Je kunt direct solliciteren via de onderstaande button. Wil je nog niet solliciteren, maar eerst wat meer weten of een kop koffie/thee drinken om kennis te maken? Neem dan contact op met Arjen Maarse via +31615280589.


*Acquisitie naar aanleiding van deze advertentie wordt niet op prijs gesteld. #LI-AM3*
company_description: We are a new two-firm network with a 100-year legacy and a common commitment to our clients, people and communities. Global to see the big picture and local to understand it.

title: Sr. Python Engineer in ML
description:
About XITE



It’s our mission to share our passion for music videos with the world and invite people to experience music beyond listening: to **see your music**.  

  

XITE is dedicated to building the best music video experience in the world. Based in Amsterdam, XITE now reaches 100 million households across multiple territories through linear networks, interactive TV apps and on-demand streaming services. The company revolutionised the way audiences experience music videos by allowing viewers to search, like and skip through its entire catalogue, enjoy channels curated by its team of music experts and create their own channel based on a genre, decade, style or mood using its unique Mixer feature. XITE has a full music video catalogue through agreements with all major and top independent music labels and distributors, and works to expand this offering every day.

  

About the role  

We are looking for a passionate Mid+/Senior Python engineer in the Data/ML domain to join us. Together with the rest of the team you will be responsible for our machine learning services in production: software and service design/development, monitoring, practical MLOps, performance and architecture. Our technical stack includes Python, Scala, Kafka, ClickHouse, Docker, Bazel, Kubernetes, GCP, Superset and many other, mostly open source, technologies. To accomplish your goals you will take a core role for a team of data and machine learning engineers, working closely with the Data Science, Data Analytics, and Backend Engineering teams, as well as other technical teams and non-technical stakeholders within XITE.

  


Responsibilities


* Design, develop and scale new/existing data and machine learning pipelines (ETLs, feature stores, productize model training and serving), data products and services.
* Resolve problems, with end-to-end ownership of machine learning and data preparation/transformation pipelines.
* Assist colleagues across technical challenges.
* Design, test, install and maintain highly scalable and data-intensive systems.
* Review, maintain, refactor and extend distributed systems in production. Support other teams for usage and integration with those systems.
* Maintain the technical excellence of the data, ML and software engineering practices.
* Work on shared libraries, infrastructure and building blocks within monorepo space.
* Work with the Product Manager and other stakeholders, taking part in forming, prioritising and executing data intensive products backlog.

  

* Broad interest and experience within ML/Data domains.
* Proven professional experience as a Software Engineer, Machine Learning Engineer or Data Engineer, working with systems and data infrastructure at scale.
* Experience with crafting and building large scale data pipelines in distributed environments with technologies such as Kafka, ClickHouse, Elastic, Cassandra, Spark/PySpark or similar.
* Experience with data streams processing tools and concepts.
* Experience optimising ML models, services, pipelines and procedures for performance, cost and usability.
* Knowledge of the main architecture models and concepts like replication, sharding, consistency, horizontal and vertical scaling, idempotency.
* Experience with MLOps practises, building and deploying ML models and data pipelines.
* Preferably a university degree in Software Engineering or other relevant field or comparable work experience.
* Experience with data pipeline orchestrators such as AirFlow, Kubeflow, Dagster or similar.
* Excellent analytical and communication skills.
* Experience in working with monorepo environments (e.g. Bazel based) is a plus.
* Experience in operationalising recommender systems is a plus.
* For this role we want you to be in our office regularly, we are looking for a candidate that is already living in the Netherlands or open to relocation.

  

Our Tech Stack


* Python 3 (Pandas, Polars, NumPy, Pydantic), Scala (cats, cats-effect, fs2).
* Kafka, ClickHouse, PostgreSQL, Redis, MongoDB, Memgraph, GCP Buckets, MLFlow, Prometheus.
* Bazel, Docker, Kubernetes, Airflow, GCP.
* GitHub, CircleCI, Ansible, Superset, Grafana and many other, mostly open source, technologies.

  

Working at XITE

  


Here at XITE we make sure you’re taken care of by providing you the opportunity to develop your career in a young, fast growing and international company. We provide a challenging work environment where you have a lot of autonomy, flexible working hours and no day will be the same for sure. We don’t hire assholes! All XITE’ers are different and authentic in their own way, but we all have kindness in common. Like professionalism and a flexible and an optimistic attitude. And let’s not forget; We have a passion for music and good food. That’s why we have chef prepared lunches, drinks, rooftop BBQ's! Click here to see all our benefits.

  

Up for the challenge? Then hit that ‘Apply for this Job’ button!
company_description: XITE is dedicated to building the best music video experience in the world. XITE now reaches 100 million households trough linear networks, interactive TV apps, on demand streaming services.

title: Twinscan Factory LAB Business Engineer
description:
***Introduction***
------------------


The sector Twinscan Factory is responsible for the production and installation of Twinscan systems. The complete production process of the most advanced DUV machines takes place within this sector. The LAB organization is responsible to introduce New Product Introductions (NPI) as well as major Process Improvements in the FAB.


Key areas of responsibility


Resource Management

* Support LAB management in mid- and long-term capacity planning on workforce and tooling and provide advice in decision-making on capacity.

Performance Management

* Support LAB management in the design of performance metrics, such as KPI’s using multiple sources and data sets. Give constructive recommendations for improvement based on performance.
* Develop and implement BI dashboards, reports and tools to support business daily operations.
* Proactively analyze reports to communicate risks and opportunities and develop solutions which allow the company to make data informed decisions and operate more effectively.

General introduction


As a business process engineer, every day is different. One day is devoted by business reporting activities in which you gather information from several data sources such as SAP but also from team leaders. You use this information to calculate KPI’s and support management in their weekly operations and you see how the factory is managed. In the past you helped management to define those KPI’s and to cascade them over different levels of processes. Other days, you are the independent sparring partner for management when you calculate the required amount of FTE for a certain output plan you receive from the supply chain management department. However, the ad-hoc questions from managers keep you busy as well.


Working environment


You will be working along all levels of the factory, from management to the operators on the shopfloor, but you will have cross-sectoral stakeholders as well. Some tasks are more routinely and others are projects or ad-hoc requests, however almost always in-depth analysis comes together with people and change. Sometimes approaching several deadlines can be stressful, but in the end it is totally worth it when you celebrate the successes with your team. Your team consists of other business process engineers.  

  

Job Mission  

As a Business Process Engineer it will be your main task to assist the TWINSCAN factory LAB management team in making business critical decisions that allow our facilities to respond to the dynamic semiconductor market and improve operational performance. Focusing primarily on ASML’s TWINSCAN factory LAB department, you will need to explore the details of the factory’s organizational structure and manufacturing and business processes and advise on tangible actions to deliver improvements. You will be exploring resource planning (e.g. by coordinating regular plan cycles and budget cycles) as well as manpower flexibility (e.g. shift schedules, hourbank models and other instruments that in- or decrease manpower capacity). You will help the organization maintain, optimize and standardize its business processes. Finally you will act as an advisor regarding factory performance and recognizing improvement potential for that performance.


Context of the position


ASML produces some of the most complex systems in the world for highly demanding customers in the fast-moving semiconductor industry. To meet our customer commitments and be successful in what we do, we need the best possible manufacturing processes and organizational structures.  

The TWINSCAN Factory is responsible for the production and installation of TWINSCAN systems, including planning and logistics. The complete production process of the most advanced machines takes place within this sector. The LAB department is responsible for New Product Introductions of all new TWINSCAN systems, for refurb all older TWINSCAN systems and the supporting departments required to do so. As well as major Process Improvements in the Factory.


About you


Personal skills

* Highly motivated team player with excellent social, coordination and communication (verbal as well as written, in Dutch & English) skills.
* Willing to take ownership, and willing to take up the initiator role (‘Lead by example’ attitude).
* Pragmatic, result-oriented and hands on attitude.
* Able to convince, inspire and motivate people, over different levels within the organization.
* Adequate presentation skills are essential.
* Ability to convert complex (often data driven) matter to clear overviews and insights
* Strong analytics mindset preferred, with an ability to set up processes and structures.

Education


Bachelor / Master degree in Technical Business Administration, Industrial Engineering or equivalent (E.g. MBA)

  

Experience

* 0-5 years of relevant experience in Industrial Engineering and/or Business Administration within an operationally oriented organization. (E.g. with process modeling , process optimization, factory analytics, business case calculations in a production environment)
* Proficient with other it-based tools in the area of production-control (Excel, SAP, PowerPoint and Visio).
* Knowledge of Lean Manufacturing.
* Experience with change management within production-organizations (pre)
*This position requires access to controlled technology, as defined in the Export Administration Regulations (15 C.F.R. § 730, et seq.). Qualified candidates must be legally authorized to access such controlled technology prior to beginning work. Business demands may require ASML to proceed with candidates who are immediately eligible to access controlled technology.*


EOE AA M/F/Veteran/Disability

*This position requires access to controlled technology, as defined in the Export Administration Regulations (15 C.F.R. § 730, et seq.). Qualified candidates must be legally authorized to access such controlled technology prior to beginning work. Business demands may require ASML to proceed with candidates who are immediately eligible to access controlled technology.*

**Diversity and inclusion**
---------------------------


ASML is an Equal Opportunity Employer that values and respects the importance of a diverse and inclusive workforce. It is the policy of the company to recruit, hire, train and promote persons in all job titles without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, or gender identity. We recognize that diversity and inclusion is a driving force in the success of our company.


Need to know more about applying for a job at ASML? Read our frequently asked questions.
company_description: ASML provides chipmakers with hardware, software and services to mass produce patterns on silicon, helping to build the electronic devices that keep us informed, entertained and connected.

title: Electrical Designer High Power and Certifications
description:
Netherlands Electronics Venlo On-site
Are you passionate about designing electrical high power systems? Are you an expert in designing a safe electrical/mechanical system according to worldwide certification requirements?

  


About The Member Company
We are a global high-tech consultancy company with a team of entrepreneurial engineers, scientists, and digital experts from around the world. Together we form a fast-growing and proud community. We offer consultancy services to high-profile clients globally in diverse service areas, such as:


* Technology & Engineering
* Energy & Renewables
* Life sciences & Pharma
* Digital & IT
**About this vacancy**
----------------------


As Electrical Designer, you add value to our products by designing (sub)modules in an multidisciplinary team and context. In this role you design high power electrical systems and make sure our complete systems comply with certification requirements worldwide.


‌


What will be your job like as Electrical Designer?


In our product development projects at R&D you are responsible and focusing on high power electronics distribution network to power the internals of our machines.


‌


Together with architects you specify and agree on requirements based on customer’s demands. It’s your task to come up with technical designs and concepts that meet these objectives, properly balancing time, quality, performance, accuracy, interdisciplinary interactions and taking cost into account.


‌


Within the project you collaborate with colleagues from other disciplines. You review your ideas and jointly develop smart creative solutions on a system level that meet the overall project objectives. You test and review your design(s) by building prototypes to proof the feasibility of the routes you have identified.


‌


You make sure that our systems comply with the various certification requirements, like Machine Directive. You keep in close contact with the certification bodies to make sure certifications are there in time. Next to that you play a role in keeping our own certification test-lab up-to-date and make sure we pass the regular audits by the certification bodies.


‌


In this role you are the subject expert on high power systems and machine level certifications. You are able to share this knowledge effectively with colleagues.


‌


Future opportunities


We also offer plenty of opportunities to further develop yourself. You can grow into roles like lead designer, architect, team lead, project lead and department head.


If you are ambitious and want to put the bar high, we’re looking for you.


‌


Responsibilities:

* Shape the design and implementation so as to get a robust and accurate system
* Make sure your designs are correctly implemented
* Communicate and present effectively in a multi-disciplinary team
* Assure compliance with worldwide certification standards for our machines


**What we expect from you**
---------------------------


What You Bring

* Master degree
* Electrical background with strong feeling for other disciplines like mechanics
* Knowledge of Machine Directive and how to apply norms in the (printer) industry
* Affinity with power distribution up to 250KVA
* Eye for detail and able to fully engineer designs to our production facilities
* Expert in thinking on a system / platform level
* Team player, hands on, practical, analytic and goal oriented
* You like to work in cross-functional teams
* Fluent in English, verbal and written.


**What you can expect from us**
-------------------------------


In the TMC Electronics Business Cell you will find a team of more than 100 absolute professionals in their fields. All our colleagues are an expert in some areas the world of electronics has to offer. We pride ourselves in finding really interesting and matching challenges for our colleagues and go for maximal satisfaction of our team. We are a warm team, in which new team members feel soon at home, both on a personal and professional level. We look forward to meeting you!


Our expertise is focused around FPGA development and board design, besides this, we also cover embedded software and ASIC design (analog and digital) expertise, and this at all levels. The starting designer with a couple of years’ experience feels at home, as well as the expert architect, project leader and all team members at various levels in their career.


You can be a specialist, a generalist, or a master of all with roles such as FPGA designer, all-round board designer and integrator for example.


Your ambition is our goal!


The 5 basic principles of **employeneurship**
A long-term working relationship
Enjoy the security of a long-term contract and a stable source of income while getting the opportunity to work at diverse projects.


Individual profit sharing
Full transparency. That’s it. For each of your projects, you know your hourly rate, your costs, and your individual performance-based profit sharing, all in order to stimulate your inner entrepreneur.


Business cells
Our employeneurs are grouped in business cells based on their technical expertise. They are small, focused and function as high-grade knowledge networks. And as buzzing communities of close colleagues.


YOUniversity
Every employeneur drives their own career. Together, we make a plan for personal and professional growth. Receive personal coaching and an extensive training budget to keep developing yourself and deliver outperformance at our clients.

  

The Entrepreneurial Lab
Work on your technical dreams in our lab. Collaborate with others in multidisciplinary teams to unlock out-of-the-box thinking and innovative ideas as well as entrepreneurial skills.
company_description: At TMC we believe it's people who drive technology. Our Employeneurship model creates the best conditions for technical talents to do so.

title: Senior Software Engineer(Fullstack)
description:
**WHO WE ARE**


Choreograph is WPP’s global data products and technology company. We’re on a mission to transform marketing by building the fastest, most connected data platform that bridges marketing strategy to scaled activation.
We work with agencies and clients to transform the value of data by bringing together technology, data and analytics capabilities. We deliver this through the Open Media Studio, an AI-enabled media and data platform for the next era of advertising.
We’re endlessly curious. Our team of thinkers, builders, creators and problem solvers are over 1,000 strong, across 20 markets around the world.


POSITION OVERVIEW


Do you love getting better and better at what you do? Do you thrive in an environment with a lot of change, open communication, and rapid innovations? Then maybe we will be a match!* 

Education or work experience level: HBO, University* 

Location: Sittard and/or Eindhoven* 

Hybrid way of working; You work at least one day per week onsite in Sittard  

RESPONSIBILITIES


Our self-steering teams are building a global platform that is transforming the way our users work. Our end-users are all GroupM client teams worldwide and it helps them to execute advertising campaigns more effectively and smarter. We are looking for the person who will help us make the lives of our media specialists even better.

  

You will be part of the data connections team. Together with other full-stack engineers, product managers, UX, customer success and users you will discover and deliver new functionality. All our engineers have foundational skills to build and deliver full features and expand their skills with one or more specialties like architecture, security, etc. You can count on the enthusiasm of your fellow engineers because we like to work together.

  

The stack you will be working in includes C# (.NET Core), Python, ReactJS with Typescript. In a microservices architecture hosted using GCP cloud infrastructure (including docker, Kubernetes).

  

Would you love to collaborate with teams in other countries? Are you looking for a challenge and do you have the skills to join our team? Then we are looking for you!

  

REQUIREMENTS

* You have 3+ years' experience as a full-stack software engineer
* You have experience in multiple programming languages (language-agnostic)
* You get energy from building full features together with your mission team
* You have an optimistic mentality and the 'impossible' does not exist for you.
* You speak fluent Dutch and English
* You are communicatively strong
* Experience with Domain-Driven Design is a plus

 **ABOUT CHOREOGRAPH**:


If you are ready to be at the forefront of the AdTech industry, shaping its future, and driving success for both Choreograph and our clients, we encourage you to apply and join our team.
Choreograph is the beating heart of data inside WPP’s media investment group, GroupM, the world’s leading media investment company responsible for more than $60 billion in annual media investment.. Discover more about Choreograph at www.choreograph.com

**GroupM and all its affiliates embrace and celebrate diversity, inclusivity, and equal opportunity.****We are committed to building a team that represents a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, and skills. We are a worldwide media agency network that represents global clients. The more inclusive we are, the more great work we can create together.**

title: Backend developer Digizorg
description:
**Backend developer Digizorg**
==============================


Word backend developer voor ons digitale zorgplatform. Verbeter de patiëntervaring én draag bij aan het werkplezier van onze zorgverleners!


Reageer t/m 30-12-2024
29.19.24.SB4
  
### **Functie inhoud**


Stap in de rol van backend developer voor ons innovatieve digitale zorgplatform. Onze Digizorg-app en zorgverlenerscockpit bieden een scala aan functionaliteiten zoals telemonitoring, vragenlijsten, dossierinformatie, voorlichting over behandelingen, algoritmes, chatbots en analytics. Deze toepassingen draaien op een (Azure) cloud-native API en dataplatform. Met dit platform gaan we de komende jaren de patiëntervaring aanzienlijk verbeteren en processen vergaand automatiseren. Jij vindt het leuk om:


* Na te denken over hoe we wensen van zorgverleners en patiënten technisch kunnen realiseren.
* Nieuwe technologie toe te passen in slimme software die de zorg verbetert.
* Schaalbare en veilige software te ontwikkelen die gebruikt kan worden door grote hoeveelheden gebruikers.

  
### **Werkomgeving**


Je gaat aan de slag binnen het programma Digitaal Verbonden, dat begin 2022 werd opgericht met als doel een innovatief digitaal platform te realiseren en implementeren. Momenteel zijn er 2 multidisciplinaire ontwikkelteams die volgens de Agile/Scrum-methodiek werken. In één van deze DevOps-teams werk je nauw samen met ontwerpers, mobile en backend developers, data engineers en cloud engineers. Een deel van hen werkt remote.


  
### **Profiel**

  

* Je hebt minimaal een afgeronde hbo-opleiding op het gebied van informatietechnologie.
* Je hebt relevante werkervaring als backend developer - liefst in C# .NET.
* Je bent trots op de code die je schrijft en voelt je verantwoordelijk voor de kwaliteit van wat je oplevert.
* Je hebt een goede beheersing van de Nederlandse en Engelse taal.
* Het is een pluspunt als je al ervaring hebt met (Azure) cloud native oplossingen, mobiele apps, en/of data en AI-technologie.

  

 

Bekijk hier de voorwaarden voor indiensttreding bij Erasmus MC.


  
### **Wat bieden wij**

  

* Een tijdelijk contract voor 12 maanden.
* Een bruto maandsalaris tussen de € 3.493,- en € 5.504,- (schaal 10) bij een volledige werkweek van 36 uur.
* Deels thuiswerken en 4x 9 uur werken is mogelijk.
* Een 13e maand die we al in november uitkeren en een persoonlijk reiskostenbudget.
* Een pensioenverzekering bij het ABP. Wij betalen 70% van je pensioenpremie waardoor je netto salaris hoger uitvalt dan je misschien denkt.
* Sportfaciliteiten in het Erasmus MC, een fietsenmaker en gratis fysiotherapie.

  

 

Alle arbeidsvoorwaarden zijn conform de cao Universitair Medische Centra.


  
### **Meer informatie**


Maak van deze vacature jouw nieuwe baan. Solliciteren is zo gedaan via de sollicitatiebutton.  

  

Inhoudelijke vragen over de vacature? Erik Jan Postema, backend developer, beantwoordt deze met plezier via 06 133 817 46.  

  

Deze vacature staat open totdat wij een nieuwe collega hebben gevonden. Je krijgt na ontvangst van jouw sollicitatie zo snel mogelijk een reactie.

  

Acquisitie naar aanleiding van deze advertentie is niet gewenst.

title: Data Platform Engineer - Advanced Analytics
description:
**The team**


ING Analytics Wholesale Banking team is a team of 12 people (and growing rapidly) that has the mission to make Banking in ING data driven. We do this by combining Big Data technology with Data Science to deliver high value solutions and products for our organization. We work in a fun and creative environment and we’re dedicated to bringing out the best in both each other and our projects.


Our purpose is to empower people to stay a step ahead in life and in business. We are an industry recognized strong brand with positive recognition from customers in many countries, strong financial position, omni-channel distribution strategy and international network. If you want to work at a place with lots of freedom to innovate, live by the Agile manifesto while keeping the continuity, compliance and QA measures, committed to deliver stable and secure services to end users with 'no nonsense' getting-things done mentality, please read on!

**Roles and Responsiblities**


As a Data Platform Engineer at ING you will be able to influence the architecture and infrastructure design and operations of a global data analytics platform that enables the organization to use data in an efficient and secure manner. This involves the building and maintaining components that allows the consumers of the platform perform data exploration, experimentation and model deployment.

**A day in the life of a Data Platform Engineer**

*As a Data Platform Engineer you are a very crucial part of the team. Without your work, the platform is stagnant. You build components of the platform that enables the users to build scalable pipelines, deploy models in production, perform data discovery and metadata management. You are the one that is always finding new and innovative ways to improve storage performance, resource management for data processing frameworks. CEO’s rely on you to ensure that the entire organization has a secure and scalable data platform at their disposal. Other products are praising you for all the time you save that would have been required to build and maintain a secure infrastructure to host and process data.*

*When you arrive at work and finish your morning coffee, you sit with your team to understand what new features make the lives of the platform users easier. You brainstorm ideas on how to create airflow as a service so several product teams can orchestrate their workflows in a standardized way.*

*You talk to other business users about what kind of additional features would help them in the secure development environment provided within the platform. After a lunch break with colleagues you think of a new way to improve resource provisioning for the applications running in kubernetes. As a data platform engineer at ING Analytics, you will never get bored with many experienced and skilled engineers around you, the freedom to innovate and to not only use open source tooling, but also contribute and teach about them.*


Your passion is to work with the latest and greatest open-source technologies required to build and maintain a high quality Data Engineering Platform. You will work as an engineer on different projects within the ING Analytics Wholesale Banking team. With this team, you will be building new capabilities for ING Analytics on the Platform Engineering part. You will help to launch new initiatives within ING and support teams and their projects within ING. At ING Analytics we always work with agile techniques.

* As part of the platform engineering team, design, implement and improve our big-data infrastructure (on premise and in the cloud, Google Cloud Platform). You’re passionate about balancing scale and performance with a pragmatic approach and devising highly automated solutions to guarantee the encouraged level of reliability, performance and quality in multiple environments
* Building data-related generic tools within the area of data discovery, lineage and governance that will be consumed by platform users
* Closely work with other data engineers to expand existing large-scale data systems or implementing new ones to support evolving data models, analytical products, multi-sourced data analysis, reporting capabilities and production machine learning algorithms along with data scientists
* Deliver high-quality code and solutions, alongside Site Reliability Engineers, to improve data delivery, fault-tolerance and seamlessly integrate with the production platform running our customer-facing products
* End-to-end responsibility on running the data platform, alongside data and SRE teams, monitoring key metrics around availability, performance and data delivery. Drive incidents resolution and root cause investigation within postmortems establishing a culture of collaboration between teams
* Focus on delivering fully automated, tested and self-healing systems. Engage in capacity planning and explore solutions to increase the efficiency of the platform using the opportunities of the open source technologies

**How to succeed**


We hire smart people like you for your potential. Our biggest expectation is that you’ll stay curious. Keep learning. Take on responsibility. In return, we’ll back you to develop into an even more awesome version of yourself.

* Hands-on experience in delivering highly distributed, large scale (data) platforms preferably using open-source technologies (Spark, Trino, Alluxio)
* Programming in scripting languages, e.g. Python
* Programming in a statically typed language, e.g. Golang, JVM (Java/Scala/Kotlin)
* Strong experience with SQL/NoSQL datastores, and other distributed systems (Kafka, Hive, HDFS…)
* Containerization - orchestration/deployment and provisioning automation tools e.g. Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD
* Experience with Implementing continuous delivery and deployment solutions (Gitlab, Azure DevOps)
* Bash scripting

**Nice to have the following skills:**

* Experience in working on cloud/hybrid solutions
* Security, authentication and authorisation (LDAP / Kerberos / PAM / IAM)
* You have experience with applications configuration management (Helm, Terraform)
* You are interested in developing buildpacks and operators.
* Experience in designing, building, scaling and monitoring data infrastructure
* Maintaining hosted Jupyter environments
* Experience in working with/contributing to Open-Source projects
* Affinity with Advanced Analytics, Data Science

**Rewards & benefits**

We want to make sure that it’s possible for you to strike the right balance between your career and your private life. You can find out more about our employment conditions at https://www.ing.jobs/netherlands/Why-ING/benefits.htm


The benefits of working with us at ING include:

* A salary tailored to your qualities and experience
* 24-27 vacation days depending on contract
* Pension scheme
* 13th month salary
* Individual Savings Contribution (BIS), 3.5% of your gross annual salary
* 8% Holiday payment
* Personal growth and challenging work with endless possibilities
* An informal working environment with innovative colleagues
* Work Agile, so new ideas come to life faster

**About us**


With 57,000 employees and operations in approximately 40 countries, there is no shortage of opportunities for people with initiative who want to help people take a step ahead in life and in business. Do you want to work at the cutting edge of what’s possible and at the same time ensure you work with integrity and hold the customer’s interests at heart? Do you want to be surrounded by progressive, inspiring, diverse and supportive colleagues? Then there is no better place to invest your talents than at ING. Join us. Apply today.
company_description: With 9 million account holders, ING is one of the largest and most prominent financial service providers in the Netherlands. We are part of ING Group, a global financial institution.
ceo_name: Steven van Rijswijk, CEO ING Group

title: Process Engineer
description:
**Position Title:** Process Engineer Appetizers

**Position Type:** Regular - Full-Time


**Position Location:** Lewedorp

**Requisition ID:** 29034

  

We are looking for our new **Technical Operations Process Engineer Appetizers CE (Continental Europe) M/F/X**.Within the Technical Operations organization, center of excellence for Manufacturing, you will be responsible for executing the CE Technical Operations strategy to drive and sustain manufacturing optimization (within safety, quality, and cost) to support growth and transform the operations to be future ready, while managing to develop technical expertise and leadership.


This is a CE role, and your main office will be in **Rilland, the Netherlands**. Frequent travelling (up to 30%) to our different sites within France, the Netherlands, Poland, Belgium, and other locations within Europe and globally are required. You will report to the Director Technical Operations CE.  



  

**Key responsibilities**:

  



**Manufacturing Technology**

* Contribute to developing or improving technologies (both equipment and processes).
* Leverage Capex for Safety, Cost reduction and Quality improvement (incl. identify opportunities, validate savings, Start Up Management (SUM) support through implementation, to feedback post-implementation).

 **Manufacturing Capability, Performance Management and Sustainment**

* Lead or support end-to-end execution of technical projects to improve factory performance (Safety, Quality and Cost).
* Leverage tools for optimizing factory performance: Operating Best Practices, Process control.
* Realize Line Diagnostic, Equipment Capability Check (ECC), Best Operating Practices (BOP) assessments to monitor factory performance.
* Actively engage in continuous skill development, leveraging training opportunities for enhanced technical expertise.

 **Interface to Supply chain, Innovation and R&D**

* Support Plant scale testing for New Products Development.
* Lead product transfer/contingency plants to plants when recipe is not impacted.
* Provide technical support on process standard/instructions/parameters on plant for production.

 **Team Management & Technical Expertise Development:**

* You will lead the technical operations project team with precision and adherence to process standards.
* You actively engage in continuous skill development, leveraging training opportunities for enhanced technical expertise.
* You actively deployed technical training documents to rebuild manufacturing capabilities.

**Execution of Strategy and Priorities:**

* You execute operational tasks in alignment with the strategic direction.
* You implement operational initiatives according to set priorities, ensuring timely and efficient project delivery.

**Project Management:**

* You manage the end-to-end execution of technical projects within established timelines and budgets.
* You coordinate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless project delivery to success outcomes.

**Problem Solving and Continuous Improvement:**

* You proactively identify and address operational challenges within the technical operations scope.
* You implement solutions to enhance efficiency, reduce costs, and improve performance.

**Best Practices Adherence:**

* You ensure strict adherence and sustain standards for operational excellence, quality and safety.
* You continuously evaluate (BOP audit, line diagnostic, ECC) to align with McCain standards.

 **Qualifications:**

* You have a background in Engineering, Production, Food science and experience in one or more of the following domains for at least three years: Manufacturing, Continuous improvement, R&D, Process Technology, Data Analytics, Data Integration, Programing, and/or packaging.
* You have a strong technical aptitude; this could be as a mechanical or electrical engineering, and/or plant/automation and processing line equipment and processes.
* You have a proven track record in project management and presentation.
* You work autonomously, are agile with a strong sense of ownership, take data-driven decisions with strong problem-solving skills.
* You have the necessary skills and/or knowledge of how to train people.
* Thanks to your strong computer skills and statistical analysis, you will make this job a success.
* You have excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and external stakeholders at all levels of the organization. You are fluent in English and Dutch or French.

 **Things to remember:**

* This role is based in our new office in Rilland, with frequent travel within Europe and globally.
* You will lead the strategy deployment for our Technical Operations, ensuring the success of McCain in the future.
* Career growth opportunities within a global organization.
* Opportunity to make a significant impact on McCain's Technical Operations a success in the region.
* You will work in a dynamic and collaborative global environment.

 **What we offer:**

  

* A challenging full-time job.
* A varied and responsible job in an effective and international team with flat hierarchies.
* Health contributions.
* Career and learning opportunities.
* Partial working from home is possible.

 **More information about McCain:**

McCain is a leading Canadian company in the frozen potato products market. With 22,000 employees worldwide, more than 1,000 employees in France and a presence for over 40 years, McCain France has created a partnership with 800 farmers.


Today, McCain has 54 production plants worldwide. McCain promotes values of integrity, authenticity, commitment, and solidarity by being an agent of change in a context where the safety of all is paramount.


To achieve this, actions in favor of environmental protection have been put in place: sustainable agriculture, efficient use of resources, quality food and prosperous communities

 *McCain Foods is an equal opportunity employer. We see value in ensuring we have a diverse, antiracist, inclusive, merit-based, and equitable workplace. As a global family-owned company we are proud to reflect the diverse communities around the world in which we live and work. We recognize that diversity drives our creativity, resilience, and success and makes our business stronger.*  

  

*McCain is an accessible employer. If you require an accommodation throughout the recruitment process (including alternate formats of materials or accessible meeting rooms), please let us know and we will work with you to meet your needs.*  

  

*Your privacy is important to us. By submitting personal data or information to us, you agree this will be handled in accordance with the* *Global Employee Privacy Policy*

 **Job Family:** Engineering & Technical  

**Division:** Global Manufacturing Operations  

**Department:** Value Engineering CE
  

**Location(s):** NL - Netherlands : Zeeland : Rilland

**Company:** McCain Foods Holland B.V.
